message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and believe you would find it valuable. I'm happy to offer it to you at $14,000.
Hi Alice,  $14,000 is a bit steep for me.  I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $14,000 represents the value I place on the product, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $12,500?
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $12,500 is still a bit higher than my budget.  I'm happy to go up to $11,500. This is my final offer.
